Line 64: Line 64:
====Apple v. Amazon.com: "App Store" dispute====
====Apple v. Amazon.com: "App Store" dispute====
â
In 2011 Apple filed suit against [[Amazon.com]], alleging trademark infringement and unfair competition over Amazon's use of the "App Store" phrase relating to Amazon's "[[Amazon Appstore]] Developer Portal" and Amazon's alleged other similar uses of the phrase.<ref name="AppStore">Apple Inc v. Amazon.com Inc., 11-1327, USDC ND Ca. (2011).</ref> Reuters reported that in the case Microsoft is opposing Apple's attempted registration of the phrase as a trademark, and that part of the matter is currently before the [[Trademark Trial and Appeal Board]].<ref name="Levine">Levine, Dan, [http://www.publicbroadcasting.net/wpr/news.newsmain/article/0/5/1778634/Business/Apple.sues.Amazon.com.over.APP.STORE.trademark Apple sues Amazon.com over APP STORE trademark], Reuters, 2011-03-22.</ref> In June 2001, U.S. District Judge Phyllis Hamilton, who is presiding over Apple's case against Amazon, said she'll "probably" deny Apple's motion that seeks to bar the Web retailer from using the "App Store" name.<ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-27076_3-20073524-248/judge-likely-to-deny-apples-appstore-complaint/</ref><ref>http://www.businessweek.com/news/2011-06-22/apple-bid-to-bar-amazon-appstore-will-likely-be-denied.html</ref><ref>http://www.reuters.com/article/2011/06/22/us-apple-amazon-idUSTRE75L79Y20110622</ref>
+
In 2011 Apple filed suit against [[Amazon.com]], alleging trademark infringement and unfair competition over Amazon's use of the "App Store" phrase relating to Amazon's "[[Amazon Appstore]] Developer Portal" and Amazon's alleged other similar uses of the phrase.<ref name="AppStore">Apple Inc v. Amazon.com Inc., 11-1327, USDC ND Ca. (2011).</ref> Reuters reported that in the case Microsoft is opposing Apple's attempted registration of the phrase as a trademark, and that part of the matter is currently before the [[Trademark Trial and Appeal Board]].<ref name="Levine">Levine, Dan, [http://www.publicbroadcasting.net/wpr/news.newsmain/article/0/5/1778634/Business/Apple.sues.Amazon.com.over.APP.STORE.trademark Apple sues Amazon.com over APP STORE trademark], Reuters, 2011-03-22.</ref> In June 2011, U.S. District Judge Phyllis Hamilton, who is presiding over Apple's case against Amazon, said she'll "probably" deny Apple's motion that seeks to bar the Web retailer from using the "App Store" name.<ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-27076_3-20073524-248/judge-likely-to-deny-apples-appstore-complaint/</ref><ref>http://www.businessweek.com/news/2011-06-22/apple-bid-to-bar-amazon-appstore-will-likely-be-denied.html</ref><ref>http://www.reuters.com/article/2011/06/22/us-apple-amazon-idUSTRE75L79Y20110622</ref>
